did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Nelson County (Va.) Circuit Court. Copy of chancery suit, 1833

note.label: Note
note.p: This collection forms part of the Robert Alonzo Brock Collection at The Huntington Library, San Marino, California.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Nelson County (Va.) Circuit Court. Copy of chancery suit, 1833, Robert Alonzo Brock Collection, Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Robert Alonzo Brock Collection was filmed by The Huntington Library in cooperation with The Library of Virginia with funding provided by The Library of Virginia Foundation with the support of The Roller- Bottimore Foundation and The Robins Foundation. Microfilm received 15 April 2004.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Nelson County was formed from Amherst County in 1807. It was named for Governor Thomas Nelson, Jr.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Pages 173-226 of a copybook, 1833, that records the chancery suit Silas P. Vawter and wife and others versus James P. Rodgers and others heard in Nelson County Superior Court of Law and Chancery.

originalsloc.head: Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals are located at the Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.
